availability.p: The text of the original document is in the public domain. Subject to certain exceptions, public domain works may be freely copied or used in the creation of derivative works without permission, or authorization, of the former copyright owners.

notesStmt.note: Grier states that these notes drew from Carlyle's Critical and Miscellaneous Essays, first published on July 14, 1838 (Walt Whitman: Notebooks and Unpublished Manuscripts, ed. Edward F. Grier [New York: New York University Press, 1984], 1:32n). Item is pasted down, making the verso unavailable.

row.cell: composed, as now extant, about the 13th century, but dating back with its written germs may be in the 6th century
